short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi cryptocurrency secure wallet - your key, your money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Originally developed as a safe place to store your Oxygen tokens (LIFE), our non-custodial and decentralized app has now evolved even further to let you do more with your money. Send and receive all of your favorites cryptocurrencies instantly all over the world! 

The newest version of the Oxygen Wallet extension offers a fast, easy-to-use interface and lots of exciting features to interact with differents blockchains and more than 2000 crypto-assets.

The browser wallet currently supports natively Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Oxygen (LIFE), Litecoin (LTC), BitcoinCash (BCH) and many more. You can add any erc-20 to this wallet by choosing "others" on the currency selection panel and by writing the desired smart contract address.

With this app, you can create a new crypto wallet or import it for each desired coin. You can store, send, receive, manage all of your cryptocurrencies always in a secure and clean environment, thanks to swap online. Enjoy !
